description.original: Automatically renumber numbered lists as you edit them.
description.translation: 编辑有序列表时自动重新编号。

dict..setDesc(\"Pasting keeps the sequencing: .setDesc("粘贴时保持与原有序号的连续性。")
dict..error(\"Error in handleMouseClick:\", e: .error("处理鼠标点击时发生错误:", error)
dict.name: \"Renumber lists: in selection or: name: "对列表重新编号: 在选区或光标处"
dict.name: \"Renumber lists: entire note\": name: "对列表重新编号: 整篇笔记"
dict.name: \"Reorder checkboxes: in selection: name: "对复选框重新排列: 在选区或光标处"
dict.name: \"Reorder checkboxes: entire note\: name: "对复选框重新排列: 整篇笔记"
dict.text: \"Enter single characters separate: text: "输入单个字符（空格分隔，不区分大小写）。默认值： 'X'."
dict.text: \"Example: '- /' means tasks with: text: "示例：输入 '- /' 表示将删除包含[x]、[-]或[/]的待办项，而其他字符如[>]的项将保留。"
dict..setDesc(\"Automatically sort checklists: .setDesc("勾选/取消勾选复选框时自动对任务列表进行排序。")
dict..setDesc(\"Automatically sort numbered l: .setDesc("内容变更时自动对有序列表重新排序。")
dict..setDesc(\"Whether lists always start fr: .setDesc("选择列表始终从1开始编号，或保留其原始起始数字。")
dict..appendText(\"When enabled, tasks with a: .appendText("启用时，含任意特殊复选框字符的任务将根据 ")
dict..appendText(\". When disabled, only task: .appendText(" 排序。禁用时仅排序标记为删除的任务")
dict..error( `reorderAllListsInRange is: .error(       `reorderAllListsInRange 函数调用无效=${start}, limit=${limit}. editor.lastLine()=${editor.lastLine()}`     )
dict..setDesc(\"Automatically update numbered: .setDesc("自动更新编号列表以反映更改。")
dict..setDesc(\"The first item of every numbe: .setDesc("每个编号列表的第一个项目都是1。")
